text: The Richmond Revolution season was the team's first season as an indoor football franchise and first in the Indoor Football League (IFL). One of twenty-five teams competing in the IFL for the 2010 season, the Revolution were members of the Atlantic East Division of the United Conference. The team played their home games at Arthur Ashe Athletic Center in Richmond, Virginia. ==Schedule== ===Regular season=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! rowspan="2" width="40" | Week ! rowspan="2" width="70" | Day !
